prompts.prompt:
produce a tidy **Markdown table** with the columns **Code** and **Name** that lists every currency supported by the Frankfurter API.

After the table:
1. State the **total number** of currencies returned.
2. Highlight any **non-sovereign** or otherwise notable currencies in a short bullet list.

template.name: list-supported-currencies
template.title: List supported currencies
template.description: Returns an easy-to-read overview of all currency codes recognised by Frankfurter.

prompts.prompt:
Fetch the **latest exchange rates** from Frankfurter for **base currency** **{base}** (defaults to EUR if omitted) and optionally limited to **{symbols}**.

Present the rates in a **Markdown table** with columns **Currency**, **Rate**, **% Difference vs Median**. Then provide:
- The **strongest** and **weakest** currencies versus {base}.
- A one-sentence summary of notable moves.

Endpoint to call: `https://api.frankfurter.dev/v1/latest?base={base}&symbols={symbols}` (omit unused query parameters).

template.name: latest-rates
template.title: Latest rates
template.description: Shows up-to-date reference rates relative to a given base currency, highlighting outliers.

arguments.name: base
arguments.description: Three-letter ISO code for the base currency (e.g., USD). Optional; defaults to EUR.

arguments.name: symbols
arguments.description: Comma-separated list of target currency codes to filter by (e.g., USD,JPY). Optional.

prompts.prompt:
Retrieve **historical rates** for **{date}** (UTC) with optional **base {base}** and **symbols {symbols}** using `https://api.frankfurter.dev/v1/{date}?base={base}&symbols={symbols}` (omit empty params).

Return a **Markdown table** of the rates and then compare each rate to the **previous working day's** value, adding a **Î” column** showing percentage change. Finish with a concise paragraph noting any significant shifts (>1%).

template.name: historical-rates-on-date
template.title: Historical rates on date
template.description: Displays rates for a specific calendar date and compares them to the prior day.

prompts.prompt:
Analyse the **trend** of **{symbols}** against EUR between **{startDate}** and **{endDate}** inclusive using `https://api.frankfurter.dev/v1/{startDate}..{endDate}?symbols={symbols}`.

For each currency:
1. Plot a simple **sparkline-style ASCII** trend (up to 20 points).
2. Show **start**, **end**, **absolute change**, and **% change**.
3. Identify the **largest single-day move** during the period.

Conclude with an executive summary of overall trends in <100 words.

template.name: time-series-comparison
template.title: Time-series comparison
template.description: Evaluates historical performance of selected currencies over a date range.

arguments.name: symbols
arguments.description: Comma-separated list of currencies to analyse.

prompts.prompt:
Convert **{amount} {from}** to **{to}** at the latest reference rate:

1. Call `https://api.frankfurter.dev/v1/latest?base={from}&symbols={to}`.
2. Multiply {amount} by the returned rate.
3. Present the result as `X {from} = Y {to}` rounded to **2 decimals**.
4. Add a note on whether the {to} currency has **appreciated** or **depreciated** by more than 1% in the past week.

Return a short, user-friendly sentence followed by the raw JSON used for the conversion.

template.name: convert-amount
template.title: Convert amount
template.description: Performs a currency conversion using the latest available rate and adds contextual insight.
